name: Animals Material Icons
description:
With this free pack of Material style animal icons, you can give a colorful new look to your new zoo project. These icons have been created with Icon Mixer, a free tool for creating vector icons with a touch of color.


You will find 30 ready to use animal icons such as; crocodiles, whales, dogs, cats, snakes, bees, birds, bats and many more. All files are fully editable, scalable and customizable to your specific needs.


Combine and mix thousands of vector icons in both SVG and PNG to get unlimited creative icon packs with tons of styles like: iOS, Material, Flat, Line Icons, Windows, Fluent, and more.


Highlights


  • Easy to edit and change colors
  • Organized components
  • Icons are scalable to any size you need
  • Easy to use for developers
  • Well organized icon names


Create your own icons with the Icon Mixer


Get a pack of 2 million lifetime icons at a reduced price
